name: HolyHell War
description: The war between Demons and Priests is finally about to end, the two factions battle for supremacy for the five altars of power, each one wanting to accomplish the final ritual and bring their master in the human's world, choose your side. You can play with two people on the Keyboard(ZQSD/ArrowKey) and/or with Xbox 360's Controllers. Stand on the altar to capture them and shoot your opponents to kill them. Minimum two players.
